channel.title: Loading 602 and 604 client wont work... PLEASE HELP!
channel.description:
Dear people of Moparscape. Recently, i had Windows XP and my computer was playing 602s easily. But now, i have windows 7 and since that time, when i load a client wich is 602, it makes and totally wierd error i don't know how to solve. here is a screen of cmd showing error: [img]http://i55.tinypic.com/33bgup5.jpg[/img] all the other clients (317, 525, 562, 614, 634 etc.) ARE WORKING ESCEPT THOSES. Please help me I don't know what to do now. I got the right cache i even asked a pro coder and he didn't know! :( ~Smiley9648~ P.S. Here's my run.bat:
@echo off title The Last Stand 602! cd Files cd bin java -Xmx1024m -cp . client pause
I put The Last Stand to not reveal the name of real client. I use clients only to play them, not to host.

item.title: Loading 602 and 604 client wont work... PLEASE HELP!

item.title: Loading 602 and 604 client wont work... PLEASE HELP!
item.dc:creator: @smiley9648 smiley9648
item.description:
@smiley9648 wrote:

Andrew Ferguson:

Windows 7 and xp have different file locations for the major things like java and such. Check your directories.

Okay, but I’m a REALLY NOOB coder. all i know what to do is to code A LITTLE 317’s and to portforward. If theres a tutorial or checking directories, please redirect me but if not, please tell me wich ones.

Read full topic
